title: Emerald Dream Diamond Haaram: A Timeless Heirloom
materials: adorned with brilliant-cut Diamonds of VS clarity and E-F color. Features two oval-cut
vibrant Emerald gemstones. Boasts a signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate floral design, embellished with intricate diamond settings. Features two prominent vibrant green emerald stones. The design is inspired by traditional South Indian motifs, with a contemporary twist. Diamond-studded drops add movement and sparkle. The clasp is seamlessly integrated into the design for a flawless finish.
colors: Primarily a radiant gold contrasted with the dazzling white of the diamonds and the lush green of the emeralds.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
and milestone celebrations. A statement piece for a bride (Vadhu) or a show-stopping addition to any formal event.
description: This Diamond and Emerald Haaram is a testament to superior craftsmanship and timeless design. The combination of premium diamonds and vibrant emeralds makes it a valuable investment. Its traditional South Indian design ensures it remains a cherished heirloom for generations. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting shine, making it a true statement of elegance and luxury.
